text:
#Chloroquine reduces Th17 cell differentiation by stimulating T-bet expression in T cells

The antiviral effect of CQ and its derivative #hydroxychloroquine has attracted great attention due to the recent #CoronavirusOutbreak

>EVIDENCE that CQ may be a powerful therapeutic agent https://t.co/cNgjqnrpJx https://t.co/Ex9r1nhLz0
